str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
To please, with the idea of willing service rendered to others; hence almost: I serve. Probably from airo; to be agreeable.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
